definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: The burned scents from ustulate milk and matches make me hungry.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶烧糊了，火柴烧黑了，那焦香我闻见了就觉得饿。

sentences.english: Wen can see the elegant fragrance, you can taste the long poetic.
sentences.chinese: 可以闻见淡雅的清香，可以品味悠长的诗意。

sentences.english: There was rosemary behind me, and I could smell only the scent of its alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 我身后有迷迭香，我只能闻见它散发出的酒精气味。

sentences.english: When milk or matches are burnt, they give out a smell of burning and I feel hungry at the smell .
sentences.chinese: 牛奶烧糊了，火柴烧黑了，那焦香我闻见了就觉得饿。

sentences.english: Milk gets burnt, and matchstick gets burnt black. Those singeing smell makes me feel hungry.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶烧糊了，火柴烧黑了，那焦香我闻见了就觉得饿。

sentences.english: I lowered the head smell a fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 我低下头闻见一阵芬芳。

sentences.english: In the cultivation process he advocated the ethics to guide the knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 在修养过程中主张以德性之知指导闻见之知。

sentences.english: When smell the taste lovers in dream I felt my own tears falling down.
sentences.chinese: 我闻见恋人遥远梦中的气息，泪水惘然。

sentences.english: I feel hungry at the smell of the milk burning overly and the match burned into black.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶烧糊了，火柴烧黑了，那焦香我闻见了就觉得饿。

sentences.english: You can't smell or see Salmonella in or on food.
sentences.chinese: 你能在食物中闻见或看见沙门氏菌。

sentences.english: Do we smell nothing as yet of the divine decomposition? Gods, too, decompose.
sentences.chinese: 我们没闻见那神圣的腐烂臭味么？
我闻见什么东西烧焦了。

sentences.english: She was nauseated by the stench of burning flesh.
sentences.chinese: 她闻见生肉燃烧的臭气直作呕。

definition: to smell/to sniff sth out/to perceive by smelling
to identify by smell/to detect a scent/to sniff out
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
smell of alcohol/flavoring of rum or other liquor in food/aroma or nose (of wine)
